events.comment: For more game templates visit gametemplates.itch.io

If a character is clicked, store the charater name in a global variable and move on to the game scene
we are going to use the global variable to create the selected player object at the beginning of the game scene
Make sure you preview/run this scene first
The player defaults to Player1 if non is selected
For more game templates visit gametemplates.itch.io

All player object is member of a group called PlayerTypes
At the beginning of the scene, create the selected player object from the PlayerTypes group using the value of the global variable
Make sure you preview/run the CharacterSelection scene first in order to make this work
The player type defaullts to Player1

events.name: Original platformer template events, nothing has changed here

events.comment: Change the animation according to what the player do.
events.comment2: On change l'animation en fonction de ce que fait le joueur.

events.comment: Make sure the camera follows the player.
